remarks: If ` A ` is contained in ` B ` and ` C ` is contained in ` D ` , then ` ( A \ D ) ` is contained in ` ( B \ C ) ` .  Deduction form. (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
statement:
ssdifd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ B ) $.
ssdif2d.2 $e |- ( ph -> C C_ D ) $.
ssdif2d $p |- ( ph -> ( A \ D ) C_ ( B \ C ) ) $.
